WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 29 AUG
   BY M/V VANTAGE TOWING SIX 155 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREAS BOUND BY
   A. 24-40.00S 042-35.00W, 24-37.00S 042-37.00W,
      24-29.00S 042-18.00W, 24-31.00S 042-18.00W.
   B. 24-44.35S 042-44.62W, 24-39.35S 042-47.30W,
      24-31.48S 042-16.23W, 24-26.63S 042-18.80W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2463/19.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 30 AUG 19.
